core.leapmotion

Class LeapMotionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • core.leapmotion.LeapMotionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LeapMotionHandler
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Handler for LeapMotion Controller Analyzes the Gestures and handles the connection

    robert
